mil6.3.8:1.1_1: tesaṁ sabbesaṁyeva dhammābhisamayo hoti, udāhu kassaci na hotī”ti?
mil6.3.8:1.4_2: pettivisayūpapannassa … micchādiṭṭhikassa … kuhakassa … mātughātakassa … pitughātakassa … arahantaghātakassa … saṅghabhedakassa … lohituppādakassa … theyyasaṁvāsakassa … titthiyapakkantassa … bhikkhunidūsakassa … terasannaṁ garukāpattīnaṁ aññataraṁ āpajjitvā avuṭṭhitassa … paṇḍakassa … ubhatobyañjanakassa suppaṭipannassāpi dhammābhisamayo na hoti … yopi manussadaharako ūnakasattavassiko,
mil6.3.8:1.5_1: soḷasannaṁ puggalānaṁ suppaṭipannānampi dhammābhisamayo na hotī”ti.
mil6.3.8:2.1_2: tesaṁ dhammābhisamayo hotu vā mā vā hotu,
mil6.3.8:2.1_3: atha kena kāraṇena manussadaharakassa ūnakasattavassikassa suppaṭipannassāpi dhammābhisamayo na hoti?
mil6.3.8:2.2_0: Ettha tāva pañho bhavati ‘nanu nāma daharakassa na rāgo hoti, na doso hoti, na moho hoti, na māno hoti, na micchādiṭṭhi hoti, na arati hoti, na kāmavitakko hoti, amissito kilesehi,
mil6.3.8:2.2_1: so nāma daharako yutto ca patto ca arahati ca cattāri saccāni ekappaṭivedhena paṭivijjhitun’”ti.
mil6.3.8:3.1_1: yenāhaṁ kāraṇena bhaṇāmi ‘ūnakasattavassikassa suppaṭipannassāpi dhammābhisamayo na hotī’ti.
mil6.3.8:3.2_1: ūnakasattavassiko rajanīye rajjeyya, dussanīye dusseyya, mohanīye muyheyya, madanīye majjeyya, diṭṭhiṁ vijāneyya, ratiñca aratiñca vijāneyya, kusalākusalaṁ vitakkeyya,
mil6.3.8:3.2_2: bhaveyya tassa dhammābhisamayo, api ca, mahārāja,
mil6.3.8:3.2_3: ūnakasattavassikassa cittaṁ abalaṁ dubbalaṁ parittaṁ appaṁ thokaṁ mandaṁ avibhūtaṁ,
mil6.3.8:3.2_4: asaṅkhatā nibbānadhātu garukā bhārikā vipulā mahatī.
mil6.3.8:3.3_1: tena dubbalena cittena parittakena mandena avibhūtena na sakkoti garukaṁ bhārikaṁ vipulaṁ mahatiṁ asaṅkhataṁ nibbānadhātuṁ paṭivijjhituṁ.
mil6.3.8:4.1_1: sinerupabbatarājā garuko bhāriko vipulo mahanto, api nu kho taṁ, mahārāja,
mil6.3.8:4.1_2: puriso attano pākatikena thāmabalavīriyena sakkuṇeyya sinerupabbatarājānaṁ uddharitun”ti?
mil6.3.8:4.5_1: ūnakasattavassikassa cittaṁ abalaṁ dubbalaṁ parittaṁ appaṁ thokaṁ mandaṁ avibhūtaṁ,
mil6.3.8:4.5_2: asaṅkhatā nibbānadhātu garukā bhārikā vipulā mahatī.
mil6.3.8:4.6_0: Ūnakasattavassiko tena dubbalena cittena parittena mandena avibhūtena na sakkoti garukaṁ bhārikaṁ vipulaṁ mahatiṁ asaṅkhataṁ nibbānadhātuṁ paṭivijjhituṁ,
mil6.3.8:4.6_1: tena kāraṇena ūnakasattavassikassa suppaṭipannassāpi dhammābhisamayo na hoti.
mil6.3.8:5.1_1: ayaṁ mahāpathavī dīghā āyatā puthulā vitthatā visālā vitthiṇṇā vipulā mahantā, api nu kho taṁ, mahārāja,
mil6.3.8:5.1_2: mahāpathaviṁ sakkā parittakena udakabindukena temetvā udakacikkhallaṁ kātun”ti?
mil6.3.8:5.5_1: ūnakasattavassikassa cittaṁ abalaṁ dubbalaṁ parittaṁ appaṁ thokaṁ mandaṁ avibhūtaṁ,
mil6.3.8:5.5_2: asaṅkhatā nibbānadhātu dīghā āyatā puthulā vitthatā visālā vitthiṇṇā vipulā mahantā.
mil6.3.8:5.6_0: Ūnakasattavassiko tena dubbalena cittena parittakena mandena avibhūtena na sakkoti mahatiṁ asaṅkhataṁ nibbānadhātuṁ paṭivijjhituṁ,
mil6.3.8:5.6_1: tena kāraṇena ūnakasattavassikassa suppaṭipannassāpi dhammābhisamayo na hoti.
mil6.3.8:6.1_1: abaladubbalaparittaappathokamandaggi bhaveyya, api nu kho, mahārāja,
mil6.3.8:6.1_2: tāvatakena mandena agginā sakkā sadevake loke andhakāraṁ vidhamitvā ālokaṁ dassetun”ti?
mil6.3.8:6.5_1: ūnakasattavassikassa cittaṁ abalaṁ dubbalaṁ parittaṁ appaṁ thokaṁ mandaṁ avibhūtaṁ,
mil6.3.8:6.6_1: tena kāraṇena ūnakasattavassikassa suppaṭipannassāpi dhammābhisamayo na hoti.
mil6.3.8:7.1_1: āturo kiso aṇuparimitakāyo sālakakimi hatthināgaṁ tidhā pabhinnaṁ navāyataṁ tivitthataṁ dasapariṇāhaṁ aṭṭharatanikaṁ sakaṭṭhānamupagataṁ disvā gilituṁ parikaḍḍheyya, api nu kho so, mahārāja,
mil6.3.8:7.5_1: ūnakasattavassikassa cittaṁ abalaṁ dubbalaṁ parittaṁ appaṁ thokaṁ mandaṁ avibhūtaṁ,
mil6.3.8:7.6_0: So tena dubbalena cittena parittakena mandena avibhūtena na sakkoti mahatiṁ asaṅkhataṁ nibbānadhātuṁ paṭivijjhituṁ,
mil6.3.8:7.6_1: tena kāraṇena ūnakasattavassikassa suppaṭipannassāpi dhammābhisamayo na hotī”ti.
